articles.description: Joe Root hopes Harry Brook's 'beer smash' celebration will be "received the right way".
articles.title: WWE 'Stone Cold' Steve Austin celebration by Harry Brook should not be frowned upon, says Joe Root.

articles.description: Harry Kane is entering the final 18 months of his Bayern Munich contract, and the German champions are eager to keep the prolific striker, as German football writer Constantin Eckner explains.
articles.title: Harry Kane: How is England captain viewed in Germany as contract talks begin?

articles.description: Chelsea have not won the Premier League since Antonio Conte led them to the title in 2017 - and now they face the Italian's Napoli side in the Champions League.
articles.title: Antonio Conte: Ten years since Italian took over at Chelsea - what has changed?

articles.description: Novak Djokovic's chances of winning a record 25th Grand Slam title are increasingly becoming now or never. Are the stars aligning in Melbourne?
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic's chances of 25th Grand Slam title opening up - but same problems remain

articles.description: After another masterclass in Asian conditions, BBC Sport breaks down how Joe Root stands out as a brilliant player of spin bowling.
articles.title: Joe Root: England legend's century vs Sri Lanka confirms place as spin-batting great

articles.description: Newly promoted Red Bull driver Isack Hadjar crashes his car in wet conditions on the second day of Formula 1 pre-season testing.
articles.title: F1 testing: Isack Hadjar crashes new Red Bull in Barcelona wet as McLaren wait until Wednesday

articles.description: Five-time major winner Brooks Koepka says Tiger Woods was the first person he called to discuss a return to the PGA Tour after leaving the LIV Golf circuit.
articles.title: Brooks Koepka return: 'I rang Tiger Woods first', says golfer on PGA Tour return

articles.description: After a new £48m investment in Wrexham, what comes next for the club that is majority-owned by Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney?
articles.title: Global brand in an EFL world -  Wrexham's finances explained as club eye Premier League

articles.description: England striker Tammy Abraham completes an £18.25m return to Aston Villa from Turkish side Besiktas.
articles.title: Tammy Abraham transfer news: Aston Villa resign striker in £18.25m deal

articles.description: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger
